description: Test ticket IDs for scanner load tests. Replace with real staging ticket IDs before testing.

raceTestTicket.description: Dedicated ticket for race condition testing - all 10 VUs target this ticket simultaneously

setup_instructions: 1. Create a test event in your staging Supabase project
2. Purchase 15+ test tickets using Stripe test mode (4242 4242 4242 4242)
3. Replace the placeholder UUIDs above with actual ticket IDs from your database
4. Set TEST_EVENT_ID environment variable to your test event ID
5. Set RACE_TEST_TICKET_ID to a dedicated unscanned ticket for race testing
6. Ensure the raceTestTicket is NOT already scanned before running tests

environment_variables.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY: Service role key for scanner operations
environment_variables.TEST_SCANNER_ID: UUID of the scanner user (defaults to placeholder if not set)
environment_variables.RACE_TEST_TICKET_ID: UUID of ticket for race condition test

notes: GA tickets (first 10) simulate general admission entry
VIP tickets (last 5) simulate VIP guest entry
Race test ticket must be reset (unscanned) before each race condition test
Run 'npm run db:seed' or equivalent to generate fresh test tickets
